column4: From an IT maintenance standpoint would I be shooting myself in the foot if I go with Ubuntu over Redhat. Linux is linux to me. I know thats blasphemy in this room but if you get down to it.
i am an ubuntu user, but I agree with you. Linux is linux. however, the problem si the support surrounding it
with ubuntu its mostly community support, and if no one know your issue, then not mch you can do
